entry.name: jQuery.ui.formResetMixin
entry.title: Form Reset Mixin
entry.desc: A mixin to call refresh() on a form widget when the parent form gets reset.

method.name: _bindFormResetHandler
method.desc: Call this._bindFormResetHandler() inside _create() to initialize the mixin.

example.desc: Set the background color of the widget's element based on an option.

method.name: _unbindFormResetHandler
method.desc: Call this._unbindFormResetHandler() inside _destroy() to destroy the mixin.
